00050       define('NUM_BIG_BLOCK_DEPOT_BLOCKS_POS', 0x2c);

00068       function GetInt4d($data, $pos) {
00069             $value = ord($data[$pos]) | (ord($data[$pos+1]) << 8) | (ord($data[$pos+2]) << 16) | (ord($data[$pos+3]) << 24);
00070             if ($value>=4294967294) {
00071                   $value=-2;
00072             }
00073             return $value;
00074       }

00077       function gmgetdate($ts = null){
00078             $k = array('seconds','minutes','hours','mday','wday','mon','year','yday','weekday','month',0);
00079             return(array_comb($k,split(":",gmdate('s:i:G:j:w:n:Y:z:l:F:U',is_null($ts)?time():$ts))));
00080             }

00082       // Added for PHP4 compatibility
00083       function array_comb($array1, $array2) {
00084             $out = array();
00085             foreach ($array1 as $key => $value) {
00086                   $out[$value] = $array2[$key];
00087             }
00088             return $out;
00089       }

00091       function v($data,$pos) {
00092             return ord($data[$pos]) | ord($data[$pos+1])<<8;
00093       }

00099             function read($sFileName){
00100                   // check if file exist and is readable (Darko Miljanovic)
00101                   if(!is_readable($sFileName)) {
00102                         $this->error = 1;
00103                         return false;
00104                   }
00105                   $this->data = @file_get_contents($sFileName);
00106                   if (!$this->data) {
00107                         $this->error = 1;
00108                         return false;
00109                   }
00110                   if (substr($this->data, 0, 8) != IDENTIFIER_OLE) {
00111                         $this->error = 1;
00112                         return false;
00113                   }
00114                   $this->numBigBlockDepotBlocks = GetInt4d($this->data, NUM_BIG_BLOCK_DEPOT_BLOCKS_POS);
00115                   $this->sbdStartBlock = GetInt4d($this->data, SMALL_BLOCK_DEPOT_BLOCK_POS);
00116                   $this->rootStartBlock = GetInt4d($this->data, ROOT_START_BLOCK_POS);
00117                   $this->extensionBlock = GetInt4d($this->data, EXTENSION_BLOCK_POS);
00118                   $this->numExtensionBlocks = GetInt4d($this->data, NUM_EXTENSION_BLOCK_POS);
00119 
00120                   $bigBlockDepotBlocks = array();
00121                   $pos = BIG_BLOCK_DEPOT_BLOCKS_POS;
00122                   $bbdBlocks = $this->numBigBlockDepotBlocks;
00123                   if ($this->numExtensionBlocks != 0) {
00124                         $bbdBlocks = (BIG_BLOCK_SIZE - BIG_BLOCK_DEPOT_BLOCKS_POS)/4;
00125                   }
00126 
00127                   for ($i = 0; $i < $bbdBlocks; $i++) {
00128                         $bigBlockDepotBlocks[$i] = GetInt4d($this->data, $pos);
00129                         $pos += 4;
00130                   }
00131 
00132 
00133                   for ($j = 0; $j < $this->numExtensionBlocks; $j++) {
00134                         $pos = ($this->extensionBlock + 1) * BIG_BLOCK_SIZE;
00135                         $blocksToRead = min($this->numBigBlockDepotBlocks - $bbdBlocks, BIG_BLOCK_SIZE / 4 - 1);
00136 
00137                         for ($i = $bbdBlocks; $i < $bbdBlocks + $blocksToRead; $i++) {
00138                               $bigBlockDepotBlocks[$i] = GetInt4d($this->data, $pos);
00139                               $pos += 4;
00140                         }
00141 
00142                         $bbdBlocks += $blocksToRead;
00143                         if ($bbdBlocks < $this->numBigBlockDepotBlocks) {
00144                               $this->extensionBlock = GetInt4d($this->data, $pos);
00145                         }
00146                   }
00147 
00148                   // readBigBlockDepot
00149                   $pos = 0;
00150                   $index = 0;
00151                   $this->bigBlockChain = array();
00152 
00153                   for ($i = 0; $i < $this->numBigBlockDepotBlocks; $i++) {
00154                         $pos = ($bigBlockDepotBlocks[$i] + 1) * BIG_BLOCK_SIZE;
00155                         //echo "pos = $pos";
00156                         for ($j = 0 ; $j < BIG_BLOCK_SIZE / 4; $j++) {
00157                               $this->bigBlockChain[$index] = GetInt4d($this->data, $pos);
00158                               $pos += 4 ;
00159                               $index++;
00160                         }
00161                   }
00162 
00163                   // readSmallBlockDepot();
00164                   $pos = 0;
00165                   $index = 0;
00166                   $sbdBlock = $this->sbdStartBlock;
00167                   $this->smallBlockChain = array();
00168 
00169                   while ($sbdBlock != -2) {
00170                     $pos = ($sbdBlock + 1) * BIG_BLOCK_SIZE;
00171                     for ($j = 0; $j < BIG_BLOCK_SIZE / 4; $j++) {
00172                         $this->smallBlockChain[$index] = GetInt4d($this->data, $pos);
00173                         $pos += 4;
00174                         $index++;
00175                     }
00176                     $sbdBlock = $this->bigBlockChain[$sbdBlock];
00177                   }
00178 
00179 
00180                   // readData(rootStartBlock)
00181                   $block = $this->rootStartBlock;
00182                   $pos = 0;
00183                   $this->entry = $this->__readData($block);
00184                   $this->__readPropertySets();
00185             }
00186 
00187             function __readData($bl) {
00188                   $block = $bl;
00189                   $pos = 0;
00190                   $data = '';
00191                   while ($block != -2)  {
00192                         $pos = ($block + 1) * BIG_BLOCK_SIZE;
00193                         $data = $data.substr($this->data, $pos, BIG_BLOCK_SIZE);
00194                         $block = $this->bigBlockChain[$block];
00195                   }
00196                   return $data;
00197              }
00198 
00199             function __readPropertySets(){
00200                   $offset = 0;
00201                   while ($offset < strlen($this->entry)) {
00202                         $d = substr($this->entry, $offset, PROPERTY_STORAGE_BLOCK_SIZE);
00203                         $nameSize = ord($d[SIZE_OF_NAME_POS]) | (ord($d[SIZE_OF_NAME_POS+1]) << 8);
00204                         $type = ord($d[TYPE_POS]);
00205                         $startBlock = GetInt4d($d, START_BLOCK_POS);
00206                         $size = GetInt4d($d, SIZE_POS);
00207                         $name = '';
00208                         for ($i = 0; $i < $nameSize ; $i++) {
00209                               $name .= $d[$i];
00210                         }
00211                         $name = str_replace("\x00", "", $name);
00212                         $this->props[] = array (
00213                               'name' => $name,
00214                               'type' => $type,
00215                               'startBlock' => $startBlock,
00216                               'size' => $size);
00217                         if ((strtolower($name) == "workbook") || ( strtolower($name) == "book")) {
00218                               $this->wrkbook = count($this->props) - 1;
00219                         }
00220                         if ($name == "Root Entry") {
00221                               $this->rootentry = count($this->props) - 1;
00222                         }
00223                         $offset += PROPERTY_STORAGE_BLOCK_SIZE;
00224                   }
00225 
00226             }

00228 
00229             function getWorkBook(){
00230                   if ($this->props[$this->wrkbook]['size'] < SMALL_BLOCK_THRESHOLD){
00231                         $rootdata = $this->__readData($this->props[$this->rootentry]['startBlock']);
00232                         $streamData = '';
00233                         $block = $this->props[$this->wrkbook]['startBlock'];
00234                         $pos = 0;
00235                         while ($block != -2) {
00236                                 $pos = $block * SMALL_BLOCK_SIZE;
00237                                 $streamData .= substr($rootdata, $pos, SMALL_BLOCK_SIZE);
00238                                 $block = $this->smallBlockChain[$block];
00239                         }
00240                         return $streamData;
00241                   }else{
00242                         $numBlocks = $this->props[$this->wrkbook]['size'] / BIG_BLOCK_SIZE;
00243                         if ($this->props[$this->wrkbook]['size'] % BIG_BLOCK_SIZE != 0) {
00244                               $numBlocks++;
00245                         }
00246 
00247                         if ($numBlocks == 0) return '';
00248                         $streamData = '';
00249                         $block = $this->props[$this->wrkbook]['startBlock'];
00250                         $pos = 0;
00251                         while ($block != -2) {
00252                           $pos = ($block + 1) * BIG_BLOCK_SIZE;
00253                           $streamData .= substr($this->data, $pos, BIG_BLOCK_SIZE);
00254                           $block = $this->bigBlockChain[$block];
00255                         }
00256                         return $streamData;
00257                   }
00258             }

00320             function myHex($d) {
00321                   if ($d < 16) return "0" . dechex($d);
00322                   return dechex($d);
00323             }

00325             function dumpHexData($data, $pos, $length) {
00326                   $info = "";
00327                   for ($i = 0; $i <= $length; $i++) {
00328                         $info .= ($i==0?"":" ") . $this->myHex(ord($data[$pos + $i])) . (ord($data[$pos + $i])>31? "[" . $data[$pos + $i] . "]":'');
00329                   }
00330                   return $info;
00331             }

00333             function getCol($col) {
00334                   if (is_string($col)) {
00335                         $col = strtolower($col);
00336                         if (array_key_exists($col,$this->colnames)) {
00337                               $col = $this->colnames[$col];

00346             function val($row,$col,$sheet=0) {
00347                   $col = $this->getCol($col);
00348                   if (array_key_exists($row,$this->sheets[$sheet]['cells']) && array_key_exists($col,$this->sheets[$sheet]['cells'][$row])) {
00349                         return $this->sheets[$sheet]['cells'][$row][$col];
00350                   }
00351                   return "";
00352             }

00361                               && array_key_exists($type,$this->sheets[$sheet]['cellsInfo'][$row][$col])) {
00362                         return $this->sheets[$sheet]['cellsInfo'][$row][$col][$type];
00363                   }
00364                   return "";
00365             }

00410             // ==========================
00411             function style($row,$col,$sheet=0,$properties='') {
00412                   $css = "";
00413                   $font=$this->font($row,$col,$sheet);
00414                   if ($font!="") {
00415                         $css .= "font-family:$font;";
00416                   }
00417                   $align=$this->align($row,$col,$sheet);
00418                   if ($align!="") {
00419                         $css .= "text-align:$align;";
00420                   }
00421                   $height=$this->height($row,$col,$sheet);
00422                   if ($height!="") {
00423                         $css .= "font-size:$height"."px;";
00424                   }
00425                   $bgcolor=$this->bgColor($row,$col,$sheet);
00426                   if ($bgcolor!="") {
00427                         $bgcolor = $this->colors[$bgcolor];
00428                         $css .= "background-color:$bgcolor;";
00429                   }
00430                   $color=$this->color($row,$col,$sheet);
00431                   if ($color!="") {
00432                         $css .= "color:$color;";
00433                   }
00434                   $bold=$this->bold($row,$col,$sheet);
00435                   if ($bold) {
00436                         $css .= "font-weight:bold;";
00437                   }
00438                   $italic=$this->italic($row,$col,$sheet);
00439                   if ($italic) {
00440                         $css .= "font-style:italic;";
00441                   }
00442                   $underline=$this->underline($row,$col,$sheet);
00443                   if ($underline) {
00444                         $css .= "text-decoration:underline;";
00445                   }
00446                   // Borders
00447                   $bLeft = $this->borderLeft($row,$col,$sheet);
00448                   $bRight = $this->borderRight($row,$col,$sheet);
00449                   $bTop = $this->borderTop($row,$col,$sheet);
00450                   $bBottom = $this->borderBottom($row,$col,$sheet);
00451                   $bLeftCol = $this->borderLeftColor($row,$col,$sheet);
00452                   $bRightCol = $this->borderRightColor($row,$col,$sheet);
00453                   $bTopCol = $this->borderTopColor($row,$col,$sheet);
00454                   $bBottomCol = $this->borderBottomColor($row,$col,$sheet);
00455                   // Try to output the minimal required style
00456                   if ($bLeft!="" && $bLeft==$bRight && $bRight==$bTop && $bTop==$bBottom) {
00457                         $css .= "border:" . $this->lineStylesCss[$bLeft] .";";
00458                   }
00459                   else {
00460                         if ($bLeft!="") { $css .= "border-left:" . $this->lineStylesCss[$bLeft] .";"; }
00461                         if ($bRight!="") { $css .= "border-right:" . $this->lineStylesCss[$bRight] .";"; }
00462                         if ($bTop!="") { $css .= "border-top:" . $this->lineStylesCss[$bTop] .";"; }
00463                         if ($bBottom!="") { $css .= "border-bottom:" . $this->lineStylesCss[$bBottom] .";"; }
00464                   }
00465                   // Only output border colors if there is an actual border specified
00466                   if ($bLeft!="" && $bLeftCol!="") { $css .= "border-left-color:" . $bLeftCol .";"; }
00467                   if ($bRight!="" && $bRightCol!="") { $css .= "border-right-color:" . $bRightCol .";"; }
00468                   if ($bTop!="" && $bTopCol!="") { $css .= "border-top-color:" . $bTopCol . ";"; }
00469                   if ($bBottom!="" && $bBottomCol!="") { $css .= "border-bottom-color:" . $bBottomCol .";"; }
00470                   
00471                   return $css;
00472             }

00551             }
00552             function fontIndex($row,$col,$sheet=0) {
00553                   return $this->xfProperty($row,$col,$sheet,'fontIndex');
00554             }
00555             function color($row,$col,$sheet=0) {
00556                   $formatColor = $this->formatColor($row,$col,$sheet);
00557                   if ($formatColor!="") {
00558                         return $formatColor;
00559                   }
00560                   $ci = $this->fontProperty($row,$col,$sheet,'color');
00561                               return $this->rawColor($ci);
00562                   }
00563                   function rawColor($ci) {
00564                   if (($ci <> 0x7FFF) && ($ci <> '')) {
00565                         return $this->colors[$ci];
00566                   }
00567                   return "";
00568             }
00569             function bold($row,$col,$sheet=0) {
00570                   return $this->fontProperty($row,$col,$sheet,'bold');
00571             }
00572             function italic($row,$col,$sheet=0) {
00573                   return $this->fontProperty($row,$col,$sheet,'italic');
00574             }
00575             function underline($row,$col,$sheet=0) {
00576                   return $this->fontProperty($row,$col,$sheet,'under');
00577             }
00578             function height($row,$col,$sheet=0) {
00579                   return $this->fontProperty($row,$col,$sheet,'height');
00580             }
00581             function font($row,$col,$sheet=0) {
00582                   return $this->fontProperty($row,$col,$sheet,'font');
00583             }
00584             
00585             // DUMP AN HTML TABLE OF THE ENTIRE XLS DATA
00586             // =========================================
00587             function dump($row_numbers=false,$col_letters=false,$sheet=0,$table_class='excel') {
00588                   $out = "<table class=\"$table_class\" cellspacing=0>";
00589                   if ($col_letters) {
00590                         $out .= "<thead>\n\t<tr>";
00591                         if ($row_numbers) {
00592                               $out .= "\n\t\t<th>&nbsp</th>";
00593                         }
00594                         for($i=1;$i<=$this->colcount($sheet);$i++) {
00595                               $style = "width:" . ($this->colwidth($i,$sheet)*1) . "px;";
00596                               if ($this->colhidden($i,$sheet)) {
00597                                     $style .= "display:none;";
00598                               }
00599                               $out .= "\n\t\t<th style=\"$style\">" . strtoupper($this->colindexes[$i]) . "</th>";
00600                         }
00601                         $out .= "</tr></thead>\n";
00602                   }
00603                   
00604                   $out .= "<tbody>\n";
00605                   for($row=1;$row<=$this->rowcount($sheet);$row++) {
00606                         $rowheight = $this->rowheight($row,$sheet);
00607                         $style = "height:" . ($rowheight*(4/3)) . "px;";
00608                         if ($this->rowhidden($row,$sheet)) {
00609                               $style .= "display:none;";
00610                         }
00611                         $out .= "\n\t<tr style=\"$style\">";
00612                         if ($row_numbers) {
00613                               $out .= "\n\t\t<th>$row</th>";
00614                         }
00615                         for($col=1;$col<=$this->colcount($sheet);$col++) {
00616                               // Account for Rowspans/Colspans
00617                               $rowspan = $this->rowspan($row,$col,$sheet);
00618                               $colspan = $this->colspan($row,$col,$sheet);
00619                               for($i=0;$i<$rowspan;$i++) {
00620                                     for($j=0;$j<$colspan;$j++) {
00621                                           if ($i>0 || $j>0) {
00622                                                 $this->sheets[$sheet]['cellsInfo'][$row+$i][$col+$j]['dontprint']=1;
00623                                           }
00624                                     }
00625                               }
00626                               if(!$this->sheets[$sheet]['cellsInfo'][$row][$col]['dontprint']) {
00627                                     $style = $this->style($row,$col,$sheet);
00628                                     if ($this->colhidden($col,$sheet)) {
00629                                           $style .= "display:none;";
00630                                     }
00631                                     $out .= "\n\t\t<td style=\"$style\"" . ($colspan > 1?" colspan=$colspan":"") . ($rowspan > 1?" rowspan=$rowspan":"") . ">";
00632                                     $val = $this->val($row,$col,$sheet);
00633                                     if ($val=='') { $val="&nbsp;"; }
00634                                     else { 
00635                                           $val = htmlentities($val); 
00636                                           $link = $this->hyperlink($row,$col,$sheet);
00637                                           if ($link!='') {
00638                                                 $val = "<a href=\"$link\">$val</a>";
00639                                           }
00640                                     }
00641                                     $out .= "<nobr>".nl2br($val)."</nobr>";
00642                                     $out .= "</td>";
00643                               }
00644                         }
00645                         $out .= "</tr>\n";
00646                   }
00647                   $out .= "</tbody></table>";
00648                   return $out;
00649             }

00828             function read16bitstring($data, $start) {
00829                   $len = 0;
00830                   while (ord($data[$start + $len]) + ord($data[$start + $len + 1]) > 0) $len++;
00831                   return substr($data, $start, $len);
00832             }
00833             
00834             // ADDED by Matt Kruse for better formatting
00835             function _format_value($format,$num,$f) {
00836                   // 49==TEXT format
00837                   // http://code.google.com/p/php-excel-reader/issues/detail?id=7
00838                   if ( (!$f && $format=="%s") || ($f==49) || ($format=="GENERAL") ) { 
00839                         return array('string'=>$num, 'formatColor'=>null); 
00840                   }
00841 
00842                   // Custom pattern can be POSITIVE;NEGATIVE;ZERO
00843                   // The "text" option as 4th parameter is not handled
00844                   $parts = split(";",$format);
00845                   $pattern = $parts[0];
00846                   // Negative pattern
00847                   if (count($parts)>2 && $num==0) {
00848                         $pattern = $parts[2];
00849                   }
00850                   // Zero pattern
00851                   if (count($parts)>1 && $num<0) {
00852                         $pattern = $parts[1];
00853                         $num = abs($num);
00854                   }
00855 
00856                   $color = "";
00857                   $matches = array();
00858                   $color_regex = "/^\[(BLACK|BLUE|CYAN|GREEN|MAGENTA|RED|WHITE|YELLOW)\]/i";
00859                   if (preg_match($color_regex,$pattern,$matches)) {
00860                         $color = strtolower($matches[1]);
00861                         $pattern = preg_replace($color_regex,"",$pattern);
00862                   }
00863                   
00864                   // In Excel formats, "_" is used to add spacing, which we can't do in HTML
00865                   $pattern = preg_replace("/_./","",$pattern);
00866                   
00867                   // Some non-number characters are escaped with \, which we don't need
00868                   $pattern = preg_replace("/\\\/","",$pattern);
00869                   
00870                   // Some non-number strings are quoted, so we'll get rid of the quotes
00871                   $pattern = preg_replace("/\"/","",$pattern);
00872 
00873                   // TEMPORARY - Convert # to 0
00874                   $pattern = preg_replace("/\#/","0",$pattern);
00875 
00876                   // Find out if we need comma formatting
00877                   $has_commas = preg_match("/,/",$pattern);
00878                   if ($has_commas) {
00879                         $pattern = preg_replace("/,/","",$pattern);
00880                   }
00881 
00882                   // Handle Percentages
00883                   if (preg_match("/\d(\%)([^\%]|$)/",$pattern,$matches)) {
00884                         $num = $num * 100;
00885                         $pattern = preg_replace("/(\d)(\%)([^\%]|$)/","$1%$3",$pattern);
00886                   }
00887 
00888                   // Handle the number itself
00889                   $number_regex = "/(\d+)(\.?)(\d*)/";
00890                   if (preg_match($number_regex,$pattern,$matches)) {
00891                         $left = $matches[1];
00892                         $dec = $matches[2];
00893                         $right = $matches[3];
00894                         if ($has_commas) {
00895                               $formatted = number_format($num,strlen($right));
00896                         }
00897                         else {
00898                               $sprintf_pattern = "%1.".strlen($right)."f";
00899                               $formatted = sprintf($sprintf_pattern, $num);
00900                         }
00901                         $pattern = preg_replace($number_regex, $formatted, $pattern);
00902                   }
00903 
00904                   return array(
00905                         'string'=>$pattern,
00906                         'formatColor'=>$color
00907                   );
00908             }
00909 
00915             function Spreadsheet_Excel_Reader($file='',$store_extended_info=true,$outputEncoding='') {
00916                   $this->_ole =& new OLERead();
00917                   $this->setUTFEncoder('iconv');
00918                   if ($outputEncoding != '') { 
00919                         $this->setOutputEncoding($outputEncoding);
00920                   }
00921                   for ($i=1; $i<245; $i++) {
00922                         $name = strtolower(( (($i-1)/26>=1)?chr(($i-1)/26+64):'') . chr(($i-1)%26+65));
00923                         $this->colnames[$name] = $i;
00924                         $this->colindexes[$i] = $name;
00925                   }
00926                   $this->store_extended_info = $store_extended_info;
00927                   if ($file!="") {
00928                         $this->read($file);
00929                   }
00930             }
00931 
00935             function setOutputEncoding($encoding) {
00936                   $this->_defaultEncoding = $encoding;
00937             }
00938 
00944             function setUTFEncoder($encoder = 'iconv') {
00945                   $this->_encoderFunction = '';
00946                   if ($encoder == 'iconv') {
00947                         $this->_encoderFunction = function_exists('iconv') ? 'iconv' : '';
00948                   } elseif ($encoder == 'mb') {
00949                         $this->_encoderFunction = function_exists('mb_convert_encoding') ? 'mb_convert_encoding' : '';
00950                   }
00951             }

00975             function read($sFileName) {
00976                   $res = $this->_ole->read($sFileName);
00977 
00978                   // oops, something goes wrong (Darko Miljanovic)
00979                   if($res === false) {
00980                         // check error code
00981                         if($this->_ole->error == 1) {
00982                               // bad file
00983                               die('The filename ' . $sFileName . ' is not readable');
00984                         }
00985                         // check other error codes here (eg bad fileformat, etc...)
00986                   }
00987                   $this->data = $this->_ole->getWorkBook();
00988                   $this->_parse();
00989             }
00990 
00997             function _parse() {
00998                   $pos = 0;
00999                   $data = $this->data;
01000 
01001                   $code = v($data,$pos);
01002                   $length = v($data,$pos+2);
01003                   $version = v($data,$pos+4);
01004                   $substreamType = v($data,$pos+6);
01005 
01006                   $this->version = $version;
01007 
01008                   if (($version != SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_BIFF8) &&
01009                         ($version != SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_BIFF7)) {
01010                         return false;
01011                   }
01012 
01013                   if ($substreamType != SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_WORKBOOKGLOBALS){
01014                         return false;
01015                   }
01016 
01017                   $pos += $length + 4;
01018 
01019                   $code = v($data,$pos);
01020                   $length = v($data,$pos+2);
01021 
01022                   while ($code != SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_TYPE_EOF) {
01023                         switch ($code) {
01024                               case SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_TYPE_SST:
01025                                     $spos = $pos + 4;
01026                                     $limitpos = $spos + $length;
01027                                     $uniqueStrings = $this->_GetInt4d($data, $spos+4);
01028                                     $spos += 8;
01029                                     for ($i = 0; $i < $uniqueStrings; $i++) {
01030                                           // Read in the number of characters
01031                                           if ($spos == $limitpos) {
01032                                                 $opcode = v($data,$spos);
01033                                                 $conlength = v($data,$spos+2);
01034                                                 if ($opcode != 0x3c) {
01035                                                       return -1;
01036                                                 }
01037                                                 $spos += 4;
01038                                                 $limitpos = $spos + $conlength;
01039                                           }
01040                                           $numChars = ord($data[$spos]) | (ord($data[$spos+1]) << 8);
01041                                           $spos += 2;
01042                                           $optionFlags = ord($data[$spos]);
01043                                           $spos++;
01044                                           $asciiEncoding = (($optionFlags & 0x01) == 0) ;
01045                                           $extendedString = ( ($optionFlags & 0x04) != 0);
01046 
01047                                           // See if string contains formatting information
01048                                           $richString = ( ($optionFlags & 0x08) != 0);
01049 
01050                                           if ($richString) {
01051                                                 // Read in the crun
01052                                                 $formattingRuns = v($data,$spos);
01053                                                 $spos += 2;
01054                                           }
01055 
01056                                           if ($extendedString) {
01057                                                 // Read in cchExtRst
01058                                                 $extendedRunLength = $this->_GetInt4d($data, $spos);
01059                                                 $spos += 4;
01060                                           }
01061 
01062                                           $len = ($asciiEncoding)? $numChars : $numChars*2;
01063                                           if ($spos + $len < $limitpos) {
01064                                                 $retstr = substr($data, $spos, $len);
01065                                                 $spos += $len;
01066                                           }
01067                                           else{
01068                                                 // found countinue
01069                                                 $retstr = substr($data, $spos, $limitpos - $spos);
01070                                                 $bytesRead = $limitpos - $spos;
01071                                                 $charsLeft = $numChars - (($asciiEncoding) ? $bytesRead : ($bytesRead / 2));
01072                                                 $spos = $limitpos;
01073 
01074                                                 while ($charsLeft > 0){
01075                                                       $opcode = v($data,$spos);
01076                                                       $conlength = v($data,$spos+2);
01077                                                       if ($opcode != 0x3c) {
01078                                                             return -1;
01079                                                       }
01080                                                       $spos += 4;
01081                                                       $limitpos = $spos + $conlength;
01082                                                       $option = ord($data[$spos]);
01083                                                       $spos += 1;
01084                                                       if ($asciiEncoding && ($option == 0)) {
01085                                                             $len = min($charsLeft, $limitpos - $spos); // min($charsLeft, $conlength);
01086                                                             $retstr .= substr($data, $spos, $len);
01087                                                             $charsLeft -= $len;
01088                                                             $asciiEncoding = true;
01089                                                       }
01090                                                       elseif (!$asciiEncoding && ($option != 0)) {
01091                                                             $len = min($charsLeft * 2, $limitpos - $spos); // min($charsLeft, $conlength);
01092                                                             $retstr .= substr($data, $spos, $len);
01093                                                             $charsLeft -= $len/2;
01094                                                             $asciiEncoding = false;
01095                                                       }
01096                                                       elseif (!$asciiEncoding && ($option == 0)) {
01097                                                             // Bummer - the string starts off as Unicode, but after the
01098                                                             // continuation it is in straightforward ASCII encoding
01099                                                             $len = min($charsLeft, $limitpos - $spos); // min($charsLeft, $conlength);
01100                                                             for ($j = 0; $j < $len; $j++) {
01101                                                                   $retstr .= $data[$spos + $j].chr(0);
01102                                                             }
01103                                                             $charsLeft -= $len;
01104                                                             $asciiEncoding = false;
01105                                                       }
01106                                                       else{
01107                                                             $newstr = '';
01108                                                             for ($j = 0; $j < strlen($retstr); $j++) {
01109                                                                   $newstr = $retstr[$j].chr(0);
01110                                                             }
01111                                                             $retstr = $newstr;
01112                                                             $len = min($charsLeft * 2, $limitpos - $spos); // min($charsLeft, $conlength);
01113                                                             $retstr .= substr($data, $spos, $len);
01114                                                             $charsLeft -= $len/2;
01115                                                             $asciiEncoding = false;
01116                                                       }
01117                                                       $spos += $len;
01118                                                 }
01119                                           }
01120                                           $retstr = ($asciiEncoding) ? $retstr : $this->_encodeUTF16($retstr);
01121 
01122                                           if ($richString){
01123                                                 $spos += 4 * $formattingRuns;
01124                                           }
01125 
01126                                           // For extended strings, skip over the extended string data
01127                                           if ($extendedString) {
01128                                                 $spos += $extendedRunLength;
01129                                           }
01130                                           $this->sst[]=$retstr;
01131                                     }
01132                                     break;
01133                               case SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_TYPE_FILEPASS:
01134                                     return false;
01135                                     break;
01136                               case SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_TYPE_NAME:
01137                                     break;
01138                               case SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_TYPE_FORMAT:
01139                                     $indexCode = v($data,$pos+4);
01140                                     if ($version == SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_BIFF8) {
01141                                           $numchars = v($data,$pos+6);
01142                                           if (ord($data[$pos+8]) == 0){
01143                                                 $formatString = substr($data, $pos+9, $numchars);
01144                                           } else {
01145                                                 $formatString = substr($data, $pos+9, $numchars*2);
01146                                           }
01147                                     } else {
01148                                           $numchars = ord($data[$pos+6]);
01149                                           $formatString = substr($data, $pos+7, $numchars*2);
01150                                     }
01151                                     $this->formatRecords[$indexCode] = $formatString;
01152                                     break;
01153                               case SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_TYPE_FONT:
01154                                           $height = v($data,$pos+4);
01155                                           $option = v($data,$pos+6);
01156                                           $color = v($data,$pos+8);
01157                                           $weight = v($data,$pos+10);
01158                                           $under  = ord($data[$pos+14]);
01159                                           $font = "";
01160                                           // Font name
01161                                           $numchars = ord($data[$pos+18]);
01162                                           if ((ord($data[$pos+19]) & 1) == 0){
01163                                                 $font = substr($data, $pos+20, $numchars);
01164                                           } else {
01165                                                 $font = substr($data, $pos+20, $numchars*2);
01166                                                 $font =  $this->_encodeUTF16($font); 
01167                                           }
01168                                           $this->fontRecords[] = array(
01169                                                       'height' => $height / 20,
01170                                                       'italic' => !!($option & 2),
01171                                                       'color' => $color,
01172                                                       'under' => !($under==0),
01173                                                       'bold' => ($weight==700),
01174                                                       'font' => $font,
01175                                                       'raw' => $this->dumpHexData($data, $pos+3, $length)
01176                                                       );
01177                                           break;
01178 
01179                               case SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_TYPE_PALETTE:
01180                                           $colors = ord($data[$pos+4]) | ord($data[$pos+5]) << 8;
01181                                           for ($coli = 0; $coli < $colors; $coli++) {
01182                                                 $colOff = $pos + 2 + ($coli * 4);
01183                                                 $colr = ord($data[$colOff]);
01184                                                 $colg = ord($data[$colOff+1]);
01185                                                 $colb = ord($data[$colOff+2]);
01186                                                 $this->colors[0x07 + $coli] = '#' . $this->myhex($colr) . $this->myhex($colg) . $this->myhex($colb);
01187                                           }
01188                                           break;
01189 
01190                               case SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_TYPE_XF:
01191                                           $fontIndexCode = (ord($data[$pos+4]) | ord($data[$pos+5]) << 8) - 1;
01192                                           $fontIndexCode = max(0,$fontIndexCode);
01193                                           $indexCode = ord($data[$pos+6]) | ord($data[$pos+7]) << 8;
01194                                           $alignbit = ord($data[$pos+10]) & 3;
01195                                           $bgi = (ord($data[$pos+22]) | ord($data[$pos+23]) << 8) & 0x3FFF;
01196                                           $bgcolor = ($bgi & 0x7F);
01197       //                                  $bgcolor = ($bgi & 0x3f80) >> 7;
01198                                           $align = "";
01199                                           if ($alignbit==3) { $align="right"; }
01200                                           if ($alignbit==2) { $align="center"; }
01201 
01202                                           $fillPattern = (ord($data[$pos+21]) & 0xFC) >> 2;
01203                                           if ($fillPattern == 0) {
01204                                                 $bgcolor = "";
01205                                           }
01206 
01207                                           $xf = array();
01208                                           $xf['formatIndex'] = $indexCode;
01209                                           $xf['align'] = $align;
01210                                           $xf['fontIndex'] = $fontIndexCode;
01211                                           $xf['bgColor'] = $bgcolor;
01212                                           $xf['fillPattern'] = $fillPattern;
01213 
01214                                           $border = ord($data[$pos+14]) | (ord($data[$pos+15]) << 8) | (ord($data[$pos+16]) << 16) | (ord($data[$pos+17]) << 24);
01215                                           $xf['borderLeft'] = $this->lineStyles[($border & 0xF)];
01216                                           $xf['borderRight'] = $this->lineStyles[($border & 0xF0) >> 4];
01217                                           $xf['borderTop'] = $this->lineStyles[($border & 0xF00) >> 8];
01218                                           $xf['borderBottom'] = $this->lineStyles[($border & 0xF000) >> 12];
01219                                           
01220                                           $xf['borderLeftColor'] = ($border & 0x7F0000) >> 16;
01221                                           $xf['borderRightColor'] = ($border & 0x3F800000) >> 23;
01222                                           $border = (ord($data[$pos+18]) | ord($data[$pos+19]) << 8);
01223 
01224                                           $xf['borderTopColor'] = ($border & 0x7F);
01225                                           $xf['borderBottomColor'] = ($border & 0x3F80) >> 7;
01226                                                                               
01227                                           if (array_key_exists($indexCode, $this->dateFormats)) {
01228                                                 $xf['type'] = 'date';
01229                                                 $xf['format'] = $this->dateFormats[$indexCode];
01230                                                 if ($align=='') { $xf['align'] = 'right'; }
01231                                           }elseif (array_key_exists($indexCode, $this->numberFormats)) {
01232                                                 $xf['type'] = 'number';
01233                                                 $xf['format'] = $this->numberFormats[$indexCode];
01234                                                 if ($align=='') { $xf['align'] = 'right'; }
01235                                           }else{
01236                                                 $isdate = FALSE;
01237                                                 $formatstr = '';
01238                                                 if ($indexCode > 0){
01239                                                       if (isset($this->formatRecords[$indexCode]))
01240                                                             $formatstr = $this->formatRecords[$indexCode];
01241                                                       if ($formatstr!="") {
01242                                                             $tmp = preg_replace("/\;.*/","",$formatstr);
01243                                                             $tmp = preg_replace("/^\[[^\]]*\]/","",$tmp);
01244                                                             if (preg_match("/[^hmsday\/\-:\s\\\,AMP]/i", $tmp) == 0) { // found day and time format
01245                                                                   $isdate = TRUE;
01246                                                                   $formatstr = $tmp;
01247                                                                   $formatstr = str_replace(array('AM/PM','mmmm','mmm'), array('a','F','M'), $formatstr);
01248                                                                   // m/mm are used for both minutes and months - oh SNAP!
01249                                                                   // This mess tries to fix for that.
01250                                                                   // 'm' == minutes only if following h/hh or preceding s/ss
01251                                                                   $formatstr = preg_replace("/(h:?)mm?/","$1i", $formatstr);
01252                                                                   $formatstr = preg_replace("/mm?(:?s)/","i$1", $formatstr);
01253                                                                   // A single 'm' = n in PHP
01254                                                                   $formatstr = preg_replace("/(^|[^m])m([^m]|$)/", '$1n$2', $formatstr);
01255                                                                   $formatstr = preg_replace("/(^|[^m])m([^m]|$)/", '$1n$2', $formatstr);
01256                                                                   // else it's months
01257                                                                   $formatstr = str_replace('mm', 'm', $formatstr);
01258                                                                   // Convert single 'd' to 'j'
01259                                                                   $formatstr = preg_replace("/(^|[^d])d([^d]|$)/", '$1j$2', $formatstr);
01260                                                                   $formatstr = str_replace(array('dddd','ddd','dd','yyyy','yy','hh','h'), array('l','D','d','Y','y','H','g'), $formatstr);
01261                                                                   $formatstr = preg_replace("/ss?/", 's', $formatstr);
01262                                                             }
01263                                                       }
01264                                                 }
01265                                                 if ($isdate){
01266                                                       $xf['type'] = 'date';
01267                                                       $xf['format'] = $formatstr;
01268                                                       if ($align=='') { $xf['align'] = 'right'; }
01269                                                 }else{
01270                                                       // If the format string has a 0 or # in it, we'll assume it's a number
01271                                                       if (preg_match("/[0#]/", $formatstr)) {
01272                                                             $xf['type'] = 'number';
01273                                                             if ($align=='') { $xf['align']='right'; }
01274                                                       }
01275                                                       else {
01276                                                       $xf['type'] = 'other';
01277                                                       }
01278                                                       $xf['format'] = $formatstr;
01279                                                       $xf['code'] = $indexCode;
01280                                                 }
01281                                           }
01282                                           $this->xfRecords[] = $xf;
01283                                     break;
01284                               case SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_TYPE_NINETEENFOUR:
01285                                     $this->nineteenFour = (ord($data[$pos+4]) == 1);
01286                                     break;
01287                               case SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_TYPE_BOUNDSHEET:
01288                                           $rec_offset = $this->_GetInt4d($data, $pos+4);
01289                                           $rec_typeFlag = ord($data[$pos+8]);
01290                                           $rec_visibilityFlag = ord($data[$pos+9]);
01291                                           $rec_length = ord($data[$pos+10]);
01292 
01293                                           if ($version == SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_BIFF8){
01294                                                 $chartype =  ord($data[$pos+11]);
01295                                                 if ($chartype == 0){
01296                                                       $rec_name   = substr($data, $pos+12, $rec_length);
01297                                                 } else {
01298                                                       $rec_name   = $this->_encodeUTF16(substr($data, $pos+12, $rec_length*2));
01299                                                 }
01300                                           }elseif ($version == SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_BIFF7){
01301                                                       $rec_name   = substr($data, $pos+11, $rec_length);
01302                                           }
01303                                     $this->boundsheets[] = array('name'=>$rec_name,'offset'=>$rec_offset);
01304                                     break;
01305 
01306                         }
01307 
01308                         $pos += $length + 4;
01309                         $code = ord($data[$pos]) | ord($data[$pos+1])<<8;
01310                         $length = ord($data[$pos+2]) | ord($data[$pos+3])<<8;
01311                   }
01312 
01313                   foreach ($this->boundsheets as $key=>$val){
01314                         $this->sn = $key;
01315                         $this->_parsesheet($val['offset']);
01316                   }
01317                   return true;
01318             }
01319 
01323             function _parsesheet($spos) {
01324                   $cont = true;
01325                   $data = $this->data;
01326                   // read BOF
01327                   $code = ord($data[$spos]) | ord($data[$spos+1])<<8;
01328                   $length = ord($data[$spos+2]) | ord($data[$spos+3])<<8;
01329 
01330                   $version = ord($data[$spos + 4]) | ord($data[$spos + 5])<<8;
01331                   $substreamType = ord($data[$spos + 6]) | ord($data[$spos + 7])<<8;
01332 
01333                   if (($version != SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_BIFF8) && ($version != SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_BIFF7)) {
01334                         return -1;
01335                   }
01336 
01337                   if ($substreamType != SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_WORKSHEET){
01338                         return -2;
01339                   }
01340                   $spos += $length + 4;
01341                   while($cont) {
01342                         $lowcode = ord($data[$spos]);
01343                         if ($lowcode == SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_TYPE_EOF) break;
01344                         $code = $lowcode | ord($data[$spos+1])<<8;
01345                         $length = ord($data[$spos+2]) | ord($data[$spos+3])<<8;
01346                         $spos += 4;
01347                         $this->sheets[$this->sn]['maxrow'] = $this->_rowoffset - 1;
01348                         $this->sheets[$this->sn]['maxcol'] = $this->_coloffset - 1;
01349                         unset($this->rectype);
01350                         switch ($code) {
01351                               case SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_TYPE_DIMENSION:
01352                                     if (!isset($this->numRows)) {
01353                                           if (($length == 10) ||  ($version == SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_BIFF7)){
01354                                                 $this->sheets[$this->sn]['numRows'] = ord($data[$spos+2]) | ord($data[$spos+3]) << 8;
01355                                                 $this->sheets[$this->sn]['numCols'] = ord($data[$spos+6]) | ord($data[$spos+7]) << 8;
01356                                           } else {
01357                                                 $this->sheets[$this->sn]['numRows'] = ord($data[$spos+4]) | ord($data[$spos+5]) << 8;
01358                                                 $this->sheets[$this->sn]['numCols'] = ord($data[$spos+10]) | ord($data[$spos+11]) << 8;
01359                                           }
01360                                     }
01361                                     break;
01362                               case SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_TYPE_MERGEDCELLS:
01363                                     $cellRanges = ord($data[$spos]) | ord($data[$spos+1])<<8;
01364                                     for ($i = 0; $i < $cellRanges; $i++) {
01365                                           $fr =  ord($data[$spos + 8*$i + 2]) | ord($data[$spos + 8*$i + 3])<<8;
01366                                           $lr =  ord($data[$spos + 8*$i + 4]) | ord($data[$spos + 8*$i + 5])<<8;
01367                                           $fc =  ord($data[$spos + 8*$i + 6]) | ord($data[$spos + 8*$i + 7])<<8;
01368                                           $lc =  ord($data[$spos + 8*$i + 8]) | ord($data[$spos + 8*$i + 9])<<8;
01369                                           if ($lr - $fr > 0) {
01370                                                 $this->sheets[$this->sn]['cellsInfo'][$fr+1][$fc+1]['rowspan'] = $lr - $fr + 1;
01371                                           }
01372                                           if ($lc - $fc > 0) {
01373                                                 $this->sheets[$this->sn]['cellsInfo'][$fr+1][$fc+1]['colspan'] = $lc - $fc + 1;
01374                                           }
01375                                     }
01376                                     break;
01377                               case SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_TYPE_RK:
01378                               case SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_TYPE_RK2:
01379                                     $row = ord($data[$spos]) | ord($data[$spos+1])<<8;
01380                                     $column = ord($data[$spos+2]) | ord($data[$spos+3])<<8;
01381                                     $rknum = $this->_GetInt4d($data, $spos + 6);
01382                                     $numValue = $this->_GetIEEE754($rknum);
01383                                     $info = $this->_getCellDetails($spos,$numValue,$column);
01384                                     $this->addcell($row, $column, $info['string'],$info);
01385                                     break;
01386                               case SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_TYPE_LABELSST:
01387                                     $row        = ord($data[$spos]) | ord($data[$spos+1])<<8;
01388                                     $column      = ord($data[$spos+2]) | ord($data[$spos+3])<<8;
01389                                     $xfindex    = ord($data[$spos+4]) | ord($data[$spos+5])<<8;
01390                                     $index  = $this->_GetInt4d($data, $spos + 6);
01391                                     $this->addcell($row, $column, $this->sst[$index], array('xfIndex'=>$xfindex) );
01392                                     break;
01393                               case SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_TYPE_MULRK:
01394                                     $row        = ord($data[$spos]) | ord($data[$spos+1])<<8;
01395                                     $colFirst   = ord($data[$spos+2]) | ord($data[$spos+3])<<8;
01396                                     $colLast    = ord($data[$spos + $length - 2]) | ord($data[$spos + $length - 1])<<8;
01397                                     $columns    = $colLast - $colFirst + 1;
01398                                     $tmppos = $spos+4;
01399                                     for ($i = 0; $i < $columns; $i++) {
01400                                           $numValue = $this->_GetIEEE754($this->_GetInt4d($data, $tmppos + 2));
01401                                           $info = $this->_getCellDetails($tmppos-4,$numValue,$colFirst + $i + 1);
01402                                           $tmppos += 6;
01403                                           $this->addcell($row, $colFirst + $i, $info['string'], $info);
01404                                     }
01405                                     break;
01406                               case SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_TYPE_NUMBER:
01407                                     $row  = ord($data[$spos]) | ord($data[$spos+1])<<8;
01408                                     $column = ord($data[$spos+2]) | ord($data[$spos+3])<<8;
01409                                     $tmp = unpack("ddouble", substr($data, $spos + 6, 8)); // It machine machine dependent
01410                                     if ($this->isDate($spos)) {
01411                                           $numValue = $tmp['double'];
01412                                     }
01413                                     else {
01414                                           $numValue = $this->createNumber($spos);
01415                                     }
01416                                     $info = $this->_getCellDetails($spos,$numValue,$column);
01417                                     $this->addcell($row, $column, $info['string'], $info);
01418                                     break;
01419 
01420                               case SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_TYPE_FORMULA:
01421                               case SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_TYPE_FORMULA2:
01422                                     $row  = ord($data[$spos]) | ord($data[$spos+1])<<8;
01423                                     $column = ord($data[$spos+2]) | ord($data[$spos+3])<<8;
01424                                     if ((ord($data[$spos+6])==0) && (ord($data[$spos+12])==255) && (ord($data[$spos+13])==255)) {
01425                                           //String formula. Result follows in a STRING record
01426                                           // This row/col are stored to be referenced in that record
01427                                           // http://code.google.com/p/php-excel-reader/issues/detail?id=4
01428                                           $previousRow = $row;
01429                                           $previousCol = $column;
01430                                     } elseif ((ord($data[$spos+6])==1) && (ord($data[$spos+12])==255) && (ord($data[$spos+13])==255)) {
01431                                           //Boolean formula. Result is in +2; 0=false,1=true
01432                                           // http://code.google.com/p/php-excel-reader/issues/detail?id=4
01433                                           if (ord($this->data[$spos+8])==1) {
01434                                                 $this->addcell($row, $column, "TRUE");
01435                                           } else {
01436                                                 $this->addcell($row, $column, "FALSE");
01437                                           }
01438                                     } elseif ((ord($data[$spos+6])==2) && (ord($data[$spos+12])==255) && (ord($data[$spos+13])==255)) {
01439                                           //Error formula. Error code is in +2;
01440                                     } elseif ((ord($data[$spos+6])==3) && (ord($data[$spos+12])==255) && (ord($data[$spos+13])==255)) {
01441                                           //Formula result is a null string.
01442                                           $this->addcell($row, $column, '');
01443                                     } else {
01444                                           // result is a number, so first 14 bytes are just like a _NUMBER record
01445                                           $tmp = unpack("ddouble", substr($data, $spos + 6, 8)); // It machine machine dependent
01446                                                   if ($this->isDate($spos)) {
01447                                                       $numValue = $tmp['double'];
01448                                                   }
01449                                                   else {
01450                                                       $numValue = $this->createNumber($spos);
01451                                                   }
01452                                           $info = $this->_getCellDetails($spos,$numValue,$column);
01453                                           $this->addcell($row, $column, $info['string'], $info);
01454                                     }
01455                                     break;
01456                               case SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_TYPE_BOOLERR:
01457                                     $row  = ord($data[$spos]) | ord($data[$spos+1])<<8;
01458                                     $column = ord($data[$spos+2]) | ord($data[$spos+3])<<8;
01459                                     $string = ord($data[$spos+6]);
01460                                     $this->addcell($row, $column, $string);
01461                                     break;
01462                               case SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_TYPE_STRING:
01463                                     // http://code.google.com/p/php-excel-reader/issues/detail?id=4
01464                                     if ($version == SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_BIFF8){
01465                                           // Unicode 16 string, like an SST record
01466                                           $xpos = $spos;
01467                                           $numChars =ord($data[$xpos]) | (ord($data[$xpos+1]) << 8);
01468                                           $xpos += 2;
01469                                           $optionFlags =ord($data[$xpos]);
01470                                           $xpos++;
01471                                           $asciiEncoding = (($optionFlags &0x01) == 0) ;
01472                                           $extendedString = (($optionFlags & 0x04) != 0);
01473                                           // See if string contains formatting information
01474                                           $richString = (($optionFlags & 0x08) != 0);
01475                                           if ($richString) {
01476                                                 // Read in the crun
01477                                                 $formattingRuns =ord($data[$xpos]) | (ord($data[$xpos+1]) << 8);
01478                                                 $xpos += 2;
01479                                           }
01480                                           if ($extendedString) {
01481                                                 // Read in cchExtRst
01482                                                 $extendedRunLength =$this->_GetInt4d($this->data, $xpos);
01483                                                 $xpos += 4;
01484                                           }
01485                                           $len = ($asciiEncoding)?$numChars : $numChars*2;
01486                                           $retstr =substr($data, $xpos, $len);
01487                                           $xpos += $len;
01488                                           $retstr = ($asciiEncoding)? $retstr : $this->_encodeUTF16($retstr);
01489                                     }
01490                                     elseif ($version == SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_BIFF7){
01491                                           // Simple byte string
01492                                           $xpos = $spos;
01493                                           $numChars =ord($data[$xpos]) | (ord($data[$xpos+1]) << 8);
01494                                           $xpos += 2;
01495                                           $retstr =substr($data, $xpos, $numChars);
01496                                     }
01497                                     $this->addcell($previousRow, $previousCol, $retstr);
01498                                     break;
01499                               case SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_TYPE_ROW:
01500                                     $row  = ord($data[$spos]) | ord($data[$spos+1])<<8;
01501                                     $rowInfo = ord($data[$spos + 6]) | ((ord($data[$spos+7]) << 8) & 0x7FFF);
01502                                     if (($rowInfo & 0x8000) > 0) {
01503                                           $rowHeight = -1;
01504                                     } else {
01505                                           $rowHeight = $rowInfo & 0x7FFF;
01506                                     }
01507                                     $rowHidden = (ord($data[$spos + 12]) & 0x20) >> 5;
01508                                     $this->rowInfo[$this->sn][$row+1] = Array('height' => $rowHeight / 20, 'hidden'=>$rowHidden );
01509                                     break;
01510                               case SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_TYPE_DBCELL:
01511                                     break;
01512                               case SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_TYPE_MULBLANK:
01513                                     $row = ord($data[$spos]) | ord($data[$spos+1])<<8;
01514                                     $column = ord($data[$spos+2]) | ord($data[$spos+3])<<8;
01515                                     $cols = ($length / 2) - 3;
01516                                     for ($c = 0; $c < $cols; $c++) {
01517                                           $xfindex = ord($data[$spos + 4 + ($c * 2)]) | ord($data[$spos + 5 + ($c * 2)])<<8;
01518                                           $this->addcell($row, $column + $c, "", array('xfIndex'=>$xfindex));
01519                                     }
01520                                     break;
01521                               case SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_TYPE_LABEL:
01522                                     $row  = ord($data[$spos]) | ord($data[$spos+1])<<8;
01523                                     $column = ord($data[$spos+2]) | ord($data[$spos+3])<<8;
01524                                     $this->addcell($row, $column, substr($data, $spos + 8, ord($data[$spos + 6]) | ord($data[$spos + 7])<<8));
01525                                     break;
01526                               case SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_TYPE_EOF:
01527                                     $cont = false;
01528                                     break;
01529                               case SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_TYPE_HYPER:
01530                                     //  Only handle hyperlinks to a URL
01531                                     $row  = ord($this->data[$spos]) | ord($this->data[$spos+1])<<8;
01532                                     $row2   = ord($this->data[$spos+2]) | ord($this->data[$spos+3])<<8;
01533                                     $column = ord($this->data[$spos+4]) | ord($this->data[$spos+5])<<8;
01534                                     $column2 = ord($this->data[$spos+6]) | ord($this->data[$spos+7])<<8;
01535                                     $linkdata = Array();
01536                                     $flags = ord($this->data[$spos + 28]);
01537                                     $udesc = "";
01538                                     $ulink = "";
01539                                     $uloc = 32;
01540                                     $linkdata['flags'] = $flags;
01541                                     if (($flags & 1) > 0 ) {   // is a type we understand
01542                                           //  is there a description ?
01543                                           if (($flags & 0x14) == 0x14 ) {   // has a description
01544                                                 $uloc += 4;
01545                                                 $descLen = ord($this->data[$spos + 32]) | ord($this->data[$spos + 33]) << 8;
01546                                                 $udesc = substr($this->data, $spos + $uloc, $descLen * 2);
01547                                                 $uloc += 2 * $descLen;
01548                                           }
01549                                           $ulink = $this->read16bitstring($this->data, $spos + $uloc + 20);
01550                                           if ($udesc == "") {
01551                                                 $udesc = $ulink;
01552                                           }
01553                                     }
01554                                     $linkdata['desc'] = $udesc;
01555                                     $linkdata['link'] = $this->_encodeUTF16($ulink);
01556                                     for ($r=$row; $r<=$row2; $r++) { 
01557                                           for ($c=$column; $c<=$column2; $c++) {
01558                                                 $this->sheets[$this->sn]['cellsInfo'][$r+1][$c+1]['hyperlink'] = $linkdata;
01559                                           }
01560                                     }
01561                                     break;
01562                               case SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_TYPE_DEFCOLWIDTH:
01563                                     $this->defaultColWidth  = ord($data[$spos+4]) | ord($data[$spos+5]) << 8; 
01564                                     break;
01565                               case SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_TYPE_STANDARDWIDTH:
01566                                     $this->standardColWidth  = ord($data[$spos+4]) | ord($data[$spos+5]) << 8; 
01567                                     break;
01568                               case SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_TYPE_COLINFO:
01569                                     $colfrom = ord($data[$spos+0]) | ord($data[$spos+1]) << 8;
01570                                     $colto = ord($data[$spos+2]) | ord($data[$spos+3]) << 8;
01571                                     $cw = ord($data[$spos+4]) | ord($data[$spos+5]) << 8; 
01572                                     $cxf = ord($data[$spos+6]) | ord($data[$spos+7]) << 8; 
01573                                     $co = ord($data[$spos+8]); 
01574                                     for ($coli = $colfrom; $coli <= $colto; $coli++) {
01575                                           $this->colInfo[$this->sn][$coli+1] = Array('width' => $cw, 'xf' => $cxf, 'hidden' => ($co & 0x01), 'collapsed' => ($co & 0x1000) >> 12);
01576                                     }
01577                                     break;
01578 
01579                               default:
01580                                     break;
01581                         }
01582                         $spos += $length;
01583                   }
01584 
01585                   if (!isset($this->sheets[$this->sn]['numRows']))
01586                          $this->sheets[$this->sn]['numRows'] = $this->sheets[$this->sn]['maxrow'];
01587                   if (!isset($this->sheets[$this->sn]['numCols']))
01588                          $this->sheets[$this->sn]['numCols'] = $this->sheets[$this->sn]['maxcol'];
01589                   }
01590 
01591                   function isDate($spos) {
01592                         $xfindex = ord($this->data[$spos+4]) | ord($this->data[$spos+5]) << 8;
01593                         return ($this->xfRecords[$xfindex]['type'] == 'date');
01594                   }
01595 
01596                   // Get the details for a particular cell
01597                   function _getCellDetails($spos,$numValue,$column) {
01598                         $xfindex = ord($this->data[$spos+4]) | ord($this->data[$spos+5]) << 8;
01599                         $xfrecord = $this->xfRecords[$xfindex];
01600                         $type = $xfrecord['type'];
01601 
01602                         $format = $xfrecord['format'];
01603                         $formatIndex = $xfrecord['formatIndex'];
01604                         $fontIndex = $xfrecord['fontIndex'];
01605                         $formatColor = "";
01606                         $rectype = '';
01607                         $string = '';
01608                         $raw = '';
01609 
01610                         if (isset($this->_columnsFormat[$column + 1])){
01611                               $format = $this->_columnsFormat[$column + 1];
01612                         }
01613 
01614                         if ($type == 'date') {
01615                               // See http://groups.google.com/group/php-excel-reader-discuss/browse_frm/thread/9c3f9790d12d8e10/f2045c2369ac79de
01616                               $rectype = 'date';
01617                               // Convert numeric value into a date
01618                               $utcDays = floor($numValue - ($this->nineteenFour ? SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_UTCOFFSETDAYS1904 : SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_UTCOFFSETDAYS));
01619                               $utcValue = ($utcDays) * SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_MSINADAY;
01620                               $dateinfo = gmgetdate($utcValue);
01621 
01622                               $raw = $numValue;
01623                               $fractionalDay = $numValue - floor($numValue) + .0000001; // The .0000001 is to fix for php/excel fractional diffs
01624 
01625                               $totalseconds = floor(SPREADSHEET_EXCEL_READER_MSINADAY * $fractionalDay);
01626                               $secs = $totalseconds % 60;
01627                               $totalseconds -= $secs;
01628                               $hours = floor($totalseconds / (60 * 60));
01629                               $mins = floor($totalseconds / 60) % 60;
01630                               $string = date ($format, mktime($hours, $mins, $secs, $dateinfo["mon"], $dateinfo["mday"], $dateinfo["year"]));
01631                         } else if ($type == 'number') {
01632                               $rectype = 'number';
01633                               $formatted = $this->_format_value($format, $numValue, $formatIndex);
01634                               $string = $formatted['string'];
01635                               $formatColor = $formatted['formatColor'];
01636                               $raw = $numValue;
01637                         } else{
01638                               if ($format=="") {
01639                                     $format = $this->_defaultFormat;
01640                               }
01641                               $rectype = 'unknown';
01642                               $formatted = $this->_format_value($format, $numValue, $formatIndex);
01643                               $string = $formatted['string'];
01644                               $formatColor = $formatted['formatColor'];
01645                               $raw = $numValue;
01646                         }
01647 
01648                         return array(
01649                               'string'=>$string,
01650                               'raw'=>$raw,
01651                               'rectype'=>$rectype,
01652                               'format'=>$format,
01653                               'formatIndex'=>$formatIndex,
01654                               'fontIndex'=>$fontIndex,
01655                               'formatColor'=>$formatColor,
01656                               'xfIndex'=>$xfindex
01657                         );
01658 
01659                   }
01660 
01661 
01662             function createNumber($spos) {
01663                   $rknumhigh = $this->_GetInt4d($this->data, $spos + 10);
01664                   $rknumlow = $this->_GetInt4d($this->data, $spos + 6);
01665                   $sign = ($rknumhigh & 0x80000000) >> 31;
01666                   $exp =  ($rknumhigh & 0x7ff00000) >> 20;
01667                   $mantissa = (0x100000 | ($rknumhigh & 0x000fffff));
01668                   $mantissalow1 = ($rknumlow & 0x80000000) >> 31;
01669                   $mantissalow2 = ($rknumlow & 0x7fffffff);
01670                   $value = $mantissa / pow( 2 , (20- ($exp - 1023)));
01671                   if ($mantissalow1 != 0) $value += 1 / pow (2 , (21 - ($exp - 1023)));
01672                   $value += $mantissalow2 / pow (2 , (52 - ($exp - 1023)));
01673                   if ($sign) {$value = -1 * $value;}
01674                   return  $value;
01675             }
01676 
01677             function addcell($row, $col, $string, $info=null) {
01678                   $this->sheets[$this->sn]['maxrow'] = max($this->sheets[$this->sn]['maxrow'], $row + $this->_rowoffset);
01679                   $this->sheets[$this->sn]['maxcol'] = max($this->sheets[$this->sn]['maxcol'], $col + $this->_coloffset);
01680                   $this->sheets[$this->sn]['cells'][$row + $this->_rowoffset][$col + $this->_coloffset] = $string;
01681                   if ($this->store_extended_info && $info) {
01682                         foreach ($info as $key=>$val) {
01683                               $this->sheets[$this->sn]['cellsInfo'][$row + $this->_rowoffset][$col + $this->_coloffset][$key] = $val;
01684                         }
01685                   }
01686             }

01689             function _GetIEEE754($rknum) {
01690                   if (($rknum & 0x02) != 0) {
01691                               $value = $rknum >> 2;
01692                   } else {
01693                         //mmp
01694                         // I got my info on IEEE754 encoding from
01695                         // http://research.microsoft.com/~hollasch/cgindex/coding/ieeefloat.html
01696                         // The RK format calls for using only the most significant 30 bits of the
01697                         // 64 bit floating point value. The other 34 bits are assumed to be 0
01698                         // So, we use the upper 30 bits of $rknum as follows...
01699                         $sign = ($rknum & 0x80000000) >> 31;
01700                         $exp = ($rknum & 0x7ff00000) >> 20;
01701                         $mantissa = (0x100000 | ($rknum & 0x000ffffc));
01702                         $value = $mantissa / pow( 2 , (20- ($exp - 1023)));
01703                         if ($sign) {
01704                               $value = -1 * $value;
01705                         }
01706                         //end of changes by mmp
01707                   }
01708                   if (($rknum & 0x01) != 0) {
01709                         $value /= 100;
01710                   }
01711                   return $value;
01712             }
01713 
01714             function _encodeUTF16($string) {
01715                   $result = $string;
01716                   if ($this->_defaultEncoding){
01717                         switch ($this->_encoderFunction){
01718                               case 'iconv' :     $result = iconv('UTF-16LE', $this->_defaultEncoding, $string);
01719                                                       break;
01720                               case 'mb_convert_encoding' :   $result = mb_convert_encoding($string, $this->_defaultEncoding, 'UTF-16LE' );
01721                                                       break;
01722                         }
01723                   }
01724                   return $result;
01725             }
01726 
01727             function _GetInt4d($data, $pos) {
01728                   $value = ord($data[$pos]) | (ord($data[$pos+1]) << 8) | (ord($data[$pos+2]) << 16) | (ord($data[$pos+3]) << 24);
01729                   if ($value>=4294967294) {
01730                         $value=-2;
01731                   }
01732                   return $value;
01733             }
01734 
01735       }
